Looking for an experienced copywriter to draft strong, compelling copy that converts.

We've already developed our Story Brand messaging strategy which the copywriter will need to review and implement into future ads, emails, landing pages, sales copy, etc.

Need ongoing help drafting, proofreading, and editing marketing copy as described above.

You will be asked to answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:

Describe your recent experience with similar projects
How do you incorporate feedback and edits into your work?
What formats are you comfortable writing in?
How do you know when your writing has been successful?

Thank you for considering me for your copywriting needs. In terms of experience, I have been a professional copywriter for over 10 years, and have worked on a wide range of projects, including marketing and advertising campaigns, emails, landing pages, and sales copy.

Incorporating feedback and edits into my work is something that I take very seriously. I believe that good communication and collaboration are key to producing high-quality work, and I am always open to hearing and implementing feedback and suggestions from clients. In terms of process, I typically start by reviewing any feedback or edits that have been provided, and then incorporate those changes into my work in a thorough and thoughtful manner.

I am comfortable writing in a variety of formats, including long and short form copy, as well as more technical formats like product descriptions and instructional materials. I am also skilled at adapting my writing style to fit the specific needs and tone of each project.

I know that my writing has been successful when it achieves the desired outcome, whether that is increased engagement, conversion, or sales. I also take pride in producing work that is clear, concise, and engaging, and that effectively communicates the key messages and value proposition of a product or service. Ultimately, I strive to create copy that resonates with readers and motivates them to take action.
now write it in the style of a solution focused sales pitch where the problem is not being able to write high converting content despite having a great product

Are you tired of struggling to produce high-converting content for your great product? Look no further! As an experienced copywriter, I can help you craft compelling, effective copy that drives results.

With my help, you'll be able to create marketing and advertising campaigns, emails, landing pages, and sales copy that engages your audience and motivates them to take action. I'll work closely with you to understand your product, your target market, and your goals, and then use that information to develop copy that speaks directly to your audience and highlights the unique value of your product.

My approach is solution-focused, and I am committed to providing high-quality work that meets your needs and exceeds your expectations. I'll work tirelessly to incorporate your feedback and edits, and I'll always strive to create copy that is clear, concise, and engaging.

Don't let poor-performing content hold back your great product any longer. Contact me today to learn more about how I can help you craft high-converting copy that drives results.
